sentence: This comes after Florida Republican Governor Ron DeSantis signed the so-called "Don't Say Gay" bill into law in March.
author: Gerrard Kaonga
title: Florida Teacher Fired for Discussing Sexual Orientation Sparks Debate

sentence: Signed by Republican Governor Ron DeSantis in March, the "Don't Say Gay" bill, officially known as the Parental Rights in Education Act, has been widely criticized as blocking all discussion of gender identity and sexual orientation in public schools.
author: Thomas Kika
title: Some Florida School Yearbooks Delayed Over Student Protest Photos
